bio: I was born in Kalispell, Montana. I am an aspiring software engineer currently studying Computer Science at the University of Montana with a concentration in Software Engineering, graduating Fall 2025. While at UM I earned placement on the Dean’s List twice and the President’s 4.0 List once, and was inducted into the Golden Key Honor Society and Phi Kappa Phi. I completed a paid internship with UM's Autonomous Aerial Systems Office (AASO), where I helped develop an LSTM algorithm for aerial research. Previously I studied at Flathead Valley Community College (graduated with honors, 2008) and Flathead High School (lettered, 4.0 GPA, graduated 2004). I have been accepted into the Montana State University M.S. in Cybersecurity program, which I plan to start Spring 2026.
researchSummary: LSTM, Mobile App Development, Software Engineering
researchInterests: Long-short term memory (LSTM) machine learning models
